alert.note: Alert for Ogle; Winnebago (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 10:44PM CDT until June 24 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Ogle County in north central Illinois... Winnebago County in north central Illinois... * Until 1115 PM CDT. * At 1044 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Durand to near Byron to near Forreston, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rockford, Loves Park, Machesney Park, Roscoe, South Beloit, Rockton, Byron, Mount Morris, Rockford Airport, Cherry Valley, Winnebago, Davis Junction, Durand, Stillman Valley, New Milford, Leaf River, Shirland and Harrison. This includes... Rock Cut State Park, Rock Valley College, and Rockford Speedway. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
